sentences.sContent: Oh, yes, of course. Some old woman, Claire something I guess.
sentences.sCn: 啊，是的，当然，一个老太太，叫克莱尔还是什么。

sentences.sContent: I spent time with Claire [Danes], and her portrayal of me back then is very authentic. She was me.
sentences.sCn: 我和克莱尔相处了一段时间，她对于那时的我的演绎是很可信的，她就是曾经的我。

sentences.sContent: He knew they had wanted to have a baby, but Claire had suffered a miscarriage after becoming pregnant by another donor.
sentences.sCn: 当时他知道她们很想要有个小孩，而克莱儿却通过另外一个捐精者的精子怀孕后不幸流产。
